description:
Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

دووس – أسلوب حياتك، بين يديك!
هل تحتاج إلى بقالة، وجبات خفيفة، أو مستلزمات يومية؟ فقط دووسها!

مع دووس، كل ما تحتاج إليه لنمط حياتك أصبح على بعد نقرة واحدة. من البقالة الطازجة إلى منتجات التجميل، ومن العناية بالطفل إلى مستلزمات التنظيف، لدينا كل شيء. توصيل سريع وموثوق إلى باب منزلك في دقائق – لأن وقتك ثمين.

لماذا دووس؟

متاح دائمًا: من الساعة 9 صباحًا حتى 2 صباحًا، طوال أيام الأسبوع.
ماذا يمكنك أن تجد على دووس؟
فواكه طازجة، خضروات، ووجبات خفيفة صحية
وجبات لذيذة، مشروبات، وأطعمة مجمدة
أفضل منتجات التنظيف، العناية الشخصية، ومستحضرات التجميل

تسوّق من آلاف المنتجات المتاحة.
ادفع بسهولة عبر بوابة دفع آمنة أو نقدًا عند الاستلام.
استرخِ – سيصل طلبك إلى باب منزلك في دقائق!

متوفر الآن في جدة والرياض!
انضم إلى عائلة دووس واختبر مستقبل التسوق. سواء كنت تريد التزويد بالبقالة أو شراء المستلزمات اليومية، نحن هنا لجعل حياتك أسهل.

لديك أسئلة؟ فريق خدمة العملاء الودود جاهز لمساعدتك. راسلنا على:
info@doos.sa - +966557035758

دووسها اليوم – لأنك تستحق الراحة بين يديك!

EggRow Keeper is a charming fridge inventory app with a unique twist — everything is designed around the metaphor of eggs in a refrigerator. The interface looks like a cozy fridge, and each product is visualized as an item in a nest, with eggs taking center stage. It helps users track food items, monitor expiration dates, estimate the total value of their fridge, and manage a shopping list — all wrapped in a light-hearted, visually engaging experience.

The main screen displays your virtual fridge with organized shelves. You can add products manually, specifying name, category, quantity, purchase date, and expiration. Categories include dairy, vegetables, meat, eggs, and others — each placed on its own "shelf." Eggs are treated as a special product type, displayed in a dedicated egg tray. When an item expires, it’s marked with a distinct “rotten egg” icon for quick recognition. You can also view a filtered list of soon-to-expire or missing items.

EggRow Keeper includes a simple analysis tool. When adding items, you can enter their price (per unit, kilogram, liter, etc.). The app then calculates the total "value" of your fridge contents. A category breakdown shows where most of your spending goes (e.g., "Dairy — 38%"). It also keeps track of patterns — how often you buy eggs, which items run out the fastest, and more.

The integrated shopping list helps with restocking. Items that are out of stock are suggested for the list automatically, but you can add or remove anything manually. Once an item is marked “purchased,” it can be moved directly into your fridge. You can also sort the list by category, making trips to the store more efficient.

A unique feature of the app is the “Egg of the Day” — a daily card offering a fun fact, quote, or practical food storage tip. The cards come in various humorous moods like “The Philosopher Egg” or “The Proud Egg.” You can save these cards to your gallery or share them with friends on social media.

Additional settings include expiration reminders, currency and unit preferences, data reset, and access to the privacy policy and developer info. EggRow Keeper offers a practical yet playful approach to home food organization — especially for egg lovers.

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -

The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.

Hey there! We’re instashop, your go-to app for all things shopping, delivered fast and easy. Curious how we make life simpler for you?

With instashop, you can shop from your favourite local supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, bakeries, butcheries, pet shops, and more, all in one place! No more store hopping, we bring them conveniently to your fingertips.

Find the shops you love.
- UAE: From Spinneys, Carrefour, Waitrose, Choithrams & ZOOM to PAUL, Café Bateel, ALBAIK, Gazebo, Allo Beirut, The Body Shop, Toys R Us, and a LOT more! 
- Egypt: From Mahmoud ElFar, Fathallah, Circle K, Spinneys, & Lulu Hypermarket to El Ezaby, El Dahan, Ibn Al Sham, Tortina, Al Fouad, Duke’s, Dog Zone, and others.

Search for your faves or explore new gems (because there’s always room for a new discovery).

Fast and flexible delivery
Need it ASAP? Get your order delivered in as little as 20 minutes (depending on your location). Not in a rush? Schedule it for when it suits you. We’re all about convenience.

Endless variety, premium quality
With over 1,000,000 products, we have everything you need! From snacks and recipe ingredients to household essentials, pharmacy supplies, organic and fresh produce, gifts & toys, pet goodies, irresistible desserts, and more.

What can we deliver? Pretty much EVERYTHING:

- Groceries
- Pharmacy essentials
- Pet supplies
- Flowers
- Fresh produce
- Organic products
- Baby care & toys
- Bakery & cakes
- Beauty & cosmetics
- Perfumes
- Stationery & party supplies
- Home & living items
- Butchery, seafood & BBQ
- Specialty shops
- Food
- Water
- Electronics
- Fitness nutrition
- Home cleaning (operated by JustLife)
- Laundry & dry cleaning (operated by Washmen)

You can also donate to trusted charities and give back to our beloved community. 

Long story short, the rule is simple: if you need it, we’ll deliver it!

Services vary based on location. Please download the app to see what's available near you.

Fire questions: 

Where can you find us? We’re currently serving the United Arab Emirates and Egypt.
Got questions? Reach out to us at contact@instashop.ae.
Loving InstaShop? Take a moment to rate us on the App Store. Thanks for your support, we couldn’t do this without you!

في تانيا الجودة ليست فقط طريقة عملنا أو أسلوب نتبعه بل هي إيمان داخلنا بأساس كل عملية نقوم بها. إنها المبدأ الجامع الذي ننتهجه في كل مجالاتنا من التعبأة، التغليف، الزجاجات، النقل، التوزيع وخدمة احتياجات عملائنا. تهدف تانيا للمياه أن تكون «الخيار الأول» في فئة المياه المعبأة في السعودية. 
لا تنتهي القصة هنا فقد قمنا بتطوير تطبيق الجوال والذي يقدم لكم المميزات التالية:
امكانية طلب عبوات المياه المختلفة المقدمة من تانيا لتصلك في الوقت والمكان المناسبين لك في ثلاث خطوات بسيطة: اختر طلبك، حدد تفاصيل الطلب، ثم تابع تقدُّم الطلب حتى يصلك!
امكانية اضافة عناوين مفضلة لتوصيل المياه إليك عند الطلب
عرض قائمة بالطلبات السابقة ومتابعة الطلبات الحالية
استلام تنبيهات عند تغيّر حالة الطلب
يوفر التطبيق طرق دفع سلسة ومريحة لتناسب الجميع: كاش، سداد أو البطاقة الائتمانية. وكذلك من خلال رصيد تانيا!
إمكانية الحصول على نقاط رصيد من تانيا ليتم استخدامها لاحقاً كطريقة للدفع
إمكانية التواصل المباشر مع خدمة العملاء في تانيا من خلال إرسال شكاوى أو مقترحات
يدعم التطبيق اللغتين العربية والانجليزية

الفئات التي يخدمها التطبيق
يخدم التطبيق جميع المستخدمين بالأعمار المختلفة حيث يمكنهم الطلب المباشر من شركة تانيا للمياه

كيفية استخدام التطبيق
يحتاج التطبيق الى تسجيل أولاً عن طريق إدخال بيانات المستخدم حتى يمكنه لاحقاً استخدامها في الحصول على طلبه من مياه تانيا
يتطلب التطبيق الاطلاع على موقع المستخدم لعرض المنتجات المتاحة حسب مكان المستخدم كما يوفر إمكانية تجاهل استخدام الـ GPS  عن طريق إدخال العنوان يدوياً
يتطلب التطبيق الوصول إلى معلومات الرسائل الخاصة بك وذلك لإرسال كود التفعيل للتحقق من رقم الهاتف الخاص بك والذي يعد الوسيلة المستخدمة للتسجيل في تطبيق تانيا

نسعد دائماً بسماع آرائكم والتي هي محل تقدير كبير من قبلنا. برجاء إرسال تعليقاتكم القيمة واقتراحاتكم على care@tania.sa
كما يسعدنا أيضاً تقييمكم للتطبيق.

Our essence culminates form a basic fact of life: Life is a Gift! So, let’s enjoy this gift together by exploring new and exciting opportunities to celebrate life! At Tania, we ensure that all these elements are incorporated in all aspects of our services and behavior and that they are the guiding principles of how Tania strives to interact with you. This is why we have created this mobile app for your comfort and happiness.

Application Features
Order any of the different water packages provided by Tania in three easy steps: Pick your order, specify its details, and then check its status until it is delivered to your doorsteps!
Add your own list of preferred addresses to deliver water to you upon request
View the history of old orders and track the status of new ones
Receive notifications about the status and updates of your order
The application provides easy and convenient payment methods for everyone: Cash, SADAD and credit card. You can also pay for your orders using Tania balance!
Request Tania credit for later use as a payment method
Get in contact with the customer service in Tania for any complaints or suggestions you have
The application is available in both Arabic and English
Who is it For?
Water is for everyone! Likewise, you are welcome to enjoy our app and services.

How to use the application
Register by keying in your personal data which will be later used for order fulfillment
Tania application requires access to your location via GPS to view the provided items by Tania according to your location. It is also possible to ignore the use of GPS by manually entering your address
Tania application requires access to your cellphone SMS in order to send the activation code to verify your phone number, which is required for the registration in Tania application.
We are always glad to hear back from you. Your valuable comments and suggestions at care@tania.sa will be highly appreciated.

Please take a few minutes to review the application for support

developer: TYG TURKEY ELEKTRONIK TICARET HIZMETLERI VE YATIRIMLARI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Get one step closer to fast and easy ordering with hundreds of options, from your favorite restaurant and grocery chains to local businesses in your neighborhood.

• Dozens of Restaurants and Grocery Stores
With the Trendyol GO by Uber Eats app, you can easily order your favorite dishes from hundreds of restaurants like Burger King, McDonald's, Domino's Pizza, Little Caesars, Popeyes, Komagene, and Starbucks, as well as your groceries from local stores in your neighborhood. Your order will arrive at your door in minutes.

• Local Businesses
The products of dozens of local businesses in your neighborhood, such as water brands, butchers, greengrocers, pet shops, florists, and nut shops, are now at your fingertips. You no longer need to go to different places for your shopping.

• Hundreds of Delicious Options & Products
Find exactly what you want from hundreds of delicious options, exactly what you need from hundreds of grocery products, and many other products you need from Your Neighborhood Shops.

• Special Offers and Great Discounts Just for You
Thanks to campaigns and features like Eat More, Save More, Flash Sales, Buy More, Save More, and cart comparisons, you can enjoy discounts on both your food orders and grocery shopping.

• Live Tracking
With GO by Uber Eats courier deliveries, you can track your order live on the map and see where the courier is in real time. When the courier arrives on your street, you'll happily run to the door.

developer: iFood Agencia de servicos de restaurantes LTDA
description:
Compre em mercados, restaurantes, farmácias e pet shop de forma fácil e rápida, tudo a um toque de você. As ofertas dos melhores mercados e restaurantes da sua cidade estão no IFood. Aqui você também encontra produtos para seu pet além de comprar itens de farmácia.

Pensou em pedir comida? Peça no IFood! Ir ao mercado, farmácia ou pet shop? Esquece, vai de IFood!

Delivery de Restaurantes
Não importa se você quer comer sushi, comida vegetariana, hambúrguer, pizza ou experimentar um restaurante novo. Use o iFood e peça em vários restaurantes no melhor app de delivery de comida para sua fome e seu bolso, sem precisar esperar uma Black Friday

Delivery de Mercado
Bateu aquela vontade de preparar sua comida em casa ou faltou algum item da compra do mês? Você pode aproveitar nosso delivery de mercado para comprar os ingredientes que faltam e receber na sua casa!

Delivery de Bebidas
Que tal umas bebidas pra curtir com os amigos no fim de semana? Com o iFood você recebe as bebidas em casa e ainda economiza com cupons de desconto e ofertas.

Delivery de Farmácia
Precisa comprar remédios, fraldas, produtos de higiene, produtos de beleza ou algum outro item de farmácia? É só pedir pelo iFood! Compre remédios, produtos de beleza e outros itens de farmácia com cupons de oferta e descontos disponíveis nas farmácias mais perto de você.

Delivery de Pet Shop
Acabou a ração do seu pet? Precisa de areia pra sua gatinha? Não tem problema! Com o iFood você pode pedir ração, areia de gato, remédios veterinários e outros itens de pet com cupons de desconto e ofertas nos pet shops perto da sua casa.

Cupons e descontos pra vc
Com o iFood você sempre tem opção de mercado, restaurante, farmácia e pet shop pra comprar com qualidade gastando pouco sempre, não só na Black Friday. Confira os vários cupons disponíveis pra você e aproveite os descontos em restaurantes, supermercados, farmácia e pet shop com entrega grátis pra pedir a qualquer hora do dia.

Milhares de opções baratinhas
Use nossa busca ou navegue pelas categorias e listas especiais pra encontrar as ofertas de comida nos melhores restaurantes, promoções de bebida, pizzaria, farmácia, pet shop ou compra de mercado. Depois, é só colocar na sacola e fechar seu pedido online. Em pouco tempo, o entregador estará na sua porta com tudo o que pediu do restaurante ou supermercado.

Acompanhe seu pedido
No iFood você recebe sua entrega de comida e mercado rapidinho e ainda pode acompanhar as etapas de preparação do pedido e entrega pelo app. Aproveite para fazer suas compras de mercado, experimentar um restaurante novo ou agendar sua comida e receber em casa.

Baixe o app de delivery que traz para pertinho de você os seus pratos favoritos, ou se decidir cozinhar, você encontra todos os ingredientes de sua receita em alguns poucos toques em supermercados. Com nosso delivery, você pede pratos dos melhores restaurantes, supermercados, farmácias e pet shop!

Tá esperando o que pra baixar nosso app de delivery de comida, mercado, farmácia e pet shop? Tenha os melhores supermercados e restaurantes, aquela pizzaria do bairro ou o mercado em que você sempre compra a apenas alguns cliques de distância. Aproveite para fazer seu pedido de comida e bebida e pedir sua entrega onde estiver. Tenha pizza, hambúrguer, comida vegetariana, sushi, fast food, comida italiana e muitos outros pratos do seu restaurante ou supermercado favorito na sua casa.

Veja a lista completa das cidades onde tem entrega do iFood. Peça agora seu delivery de comida e mercado online: https://www.ifood.com.br/cidades-atendidas

Welcome to the Tasty App – your ultimate cooking companion, featuring over 10,000 delicious recipes with video, step-by-step cooking mode, personalized recommendations, a thriving community of home chefs, and recipe shopping and seamless checkout. Tasty brings you the best of food and recipe discovery from the internet’s favorite food brand.

Key Features:

10,000+ Recipes and Collections: Explore a vast library of mouth-watering dishes, complete with video guides, step-by-step instructions, and recommendations tailored to the current season, time of day, and special occasions.

AI Botatouille: Powered by ChatGPT API, our AI assistant helps you find recipes that match your preferences and tastes, making it easy to discover new dishes and expand your culinary horizons.

Shoppable Recipe Integration: Shop for affordable recipes and get your groceries delivered or picked up through Walmart, saving you both time and money.

Tasty Community: Connect with fellow food enthusiasts, share photos of your creations, and get inspired by the dishes others have cooked up in our vibrant and supportive community.

Tips and Ratings: Learn from Tasty Creators and the Community, with helpful tips and ratings on every recipe, ensuring your cooking experience is a success.

Personalized Cookbooks: Save your favorite recipes to your profile and organize them into custom cookbooks, making it easy to find and revisit your favorite dishes.

Ingredient Search: Find the perfect recipe based on ingredients you have on hand, with our innovative "ingredient search" feature that generates dish ideas from just 3 ingredients.

Adjustable Serving Sizes: Easily adjust serving sizes per recipe, with metric values side-by-side with US measurements, accommodating users both within and outside the US.

Connect with Creators: See recipes from and interact with your favorite Tasty Creators, learn their cooking secrets, and get inspired by their culinary expertise.

Ready to embark on a delicious cooking journey? Download the Tasty App today and unlock a world of culinary inspiration at your fingertips!

If you have any trouble with your app please email us at support@buzzfeed.com so we can help! Don’t forget to check out Tasty on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube!

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see https://www.nielsen.com/us/en/legal/privacy-statement/digital-measurement/#choices for more information about Nielsen’s measurement software and learn about your choices with regard to NIELSEN’s measurement. Additionally, usage of the Tasty app is subject to our privacy policy and terms of use.

Kneady is the #1 home-baking app, made for bakers of all levels. Discover 600+ award-winning recipes from professional bakers, save your favourite recipes, join a passionate global community & much more.

** About Kneady **

- The #1 bread-baking app, suitable for bakers of all levels
- Professional recipes perfected for home cooking, with clear step-by-step guidance

** Our Mission **

We’re on a mission to help you take your home baking to the next level. Many people love bread and love baking, but bread recipes are often unnecessarily complex and buried deep in recipe books.

Kneady combines inspiring, time-tested recipes with simplicity and convenience. Follow step-by-step instructions on your smartphone, from the comfort of your home kitchen.

Perfect your bread baking with Homebaker, the bread baking notes app for home bakers that want to keep track of their bread recipes and baking sessions.

Whether you're just beginning your baking journey or you're a seasoned bread baker, Homebaker offers seamless tools to:

- Perfect your recipes: Create your own bread baking recipes by adding your preferment, dough and non-dough ingredients, as well as detailed recipe steps. Homebaker automatically calculates baker's percentages and hydration. Use recipes as templates to pre-fill your baking sessions. You can also share your recipes with fellow bakers using a public link.
- Log your baking sessions: Record every step of your baking sessions with detailed timings, descriptions, metadata (such as temperatures) and pictures. Review past sessions and refine your techniques for perfect results every time.
- Step by step precision: Never forget to add salt again. Mark baking steps as done to keep track of where you are in a baking session.
- Manage your sourdough starters: log your starter's activity and schedule feeding notifications
- Get notified: Get notified with push notifications when step timers are completed in your baking session or when it's time to check on your sourdough starter.
- Stay synced: With the Pro version (requires paid subscription) – access Homebaker from any device, including desktops, via our web app.

A subscription to Homebaker Pro is optional and can be purchased in-app to unlock the following features:
- Unlimited creation of recipes: In the free version of Homebaker the number of recipes you can create is limited. Upgrade to Pro to create as many recipes as you want, which also can be used as templates for your baking sessions
- Access to the Homebaker web app: Your recipes and sessions get synced with your Homebaker account and can be accessed in the browser via the web app. This makes it easy to manage your baking notes on desktop devices.

Subscriptions will be automatically renewed and charged on a monthly basis. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings.

You can find the Terms of Use (EULA) here: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy policy: https://www.homebaker.app/privacy
Support: https://www.homebaker.app/support

Don't be sour, let's bake some dough!

Sour & Dough is a simple, no-nonsense app for anyone baking sourdough bread at home.
Use our flour-based dough calculator to get your ingredients instantly. Then follow a step-by-step sourdough schedule with built-in baking timers — a guided experience that feels just like following a real-time bread baking recipe.
Whether you're just getting into sourdough baking or already enjoy experimenting with hydration and fermentation, this app helps you structure every stage of your bake day.

** NEW: Sourdough Schedule & Timers **
From the first mix to the final bake, our baking schedule guides you through every step — with timers that feel like a live bread recipe.
Start your sourdough bread at any time
Stay on track with bulk fermentation reminders
Follow a proven baking flow that works


►  Features
Fast and accurate dough calculator based on flour and hydration
Guided bread baking schedule
Timers for each sourdough step
Feels like following a recipe, without the clutter
Works ad-free
Minimal design for focus

► Dough Calculator
Simply enter the amount of flour you’re using. The app calculates your ideal hydration, levain, and salt — all based on baker’s percentages.
It’s an easy way to scale any sourdough recipe, experiment with new dough formulas, and perfect your crust and crumb.
Adjust hydration for different dough types
Automatic ingredient scaling
Ideal for home bread bakers
